data.meta_description: Mortefi is a playable 4-star Fusion Pistol character in Wuthering Waves (WuWa). Check out this guide for the best Mortefi build, Mortefi best teams, echoes, kit (skills), skill priority, and voice actor here!

data.text:
Mortefi is a playable 4-star Fusion Pistol character in Wuthering Waves (WuWa). Check out this guide for the best Mortefi build, Mortefi best teams, echoes, kit (skills), skill priority, and voice actor here!

Mortefi Character Overview

Mortefi Information

Resonator Information Mortefi Rarity ★★★★ Element Weapon How to Get Any Convene Banner Voice Actor (EN) Joseph May

Mortefi Rankings

Main DPS Sub-DPS Support Overall - -

How Would You Rate Mortefi?

Character Tier List

Mortefi Stats

Lv. 1 Lv. 90 HP 802 10025 ATK 20 250 DEF 93 1136 Energy Regen 100% - Crit. Rate 5% - Crit. DMG 150% -

How Strong is Mortefi?

Strengths • Strong DMG buffer for Heavy Attack users. • Provides supplemental DMG through Coordinated Attacks. • Becomes a lot stronger when his Sequence Nodes are unlocked. Weaknesses • Needs to be built with Energy Regen stats to consistently use Resonance Liberation. • Resonance Liberation Cooldown is fairly long and tedious to use without Sequence Nodes. • Needs Sequence Node 4 so that Resonance Liberation can be used comfortably.

Mortefi is a great 4-star Sub-DPS who can provide off-field Coordinated Attacks with his Resonance Liberation and buff Heavy Attacks with his Outro Skill. Mortefi becomes especially better the more Sequence Nodes are unlocked.

Mortefi Build Guide

Mortefi Best Build: Coordinated ATK Sub-DPS Build

Best Weapon Alt. Weapons Sonata Effect 5-piece Moonlit Clouds Cost Pattern ④ ③ ③ ① ① Main Echo Impermanence Heron

Mortefi Best Echo Stats

Echo Main Stats Priority ④-Cost ③-Cost ①-Cost CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate Fusion DMG or Energy Regen ATK% Echo Substats Tuning Priority 1. CRIT Rate ★★★

2. CRIT DMG ★★★

3. Energy Regen ★★

4. Res. Liberation DMG Bonus ★★

5. ATK% ★★

6. Flat ATK ★

Mortefi is a Sub DPS who can use his Resonance Liberation to deal extra damage if any on-field character does a Heavy Attack. CRIT stats are important to deal as much damage as possible while Energy Regen can let him unleash his Resonance Liberation a lot sooner.

Mortefi Best Echo Sets

Optimal Main Echo

Main Echo Explanation Impermanence Heron ・Restores Mortefi's Resonance Energy so he can cast his Ultimate more.

・Increases the next character's DMG dealt, good for a semi-support role for Mortefi. Viridblaze Saurian ・A good early game Fusion damage dealer when using Mortefi as a DPS.

・Replace with a support-centric Echo in the later parts of the game.

Echo Tier List

Mortefi Best Sonata Effects

Echo Set Rating Moonlit Clouds

(5-pc) ★★★ - Best Moonlit Clouds generally increases Mortefi's Energy Regen capabilities as well as increases the ATK of the next character that switches in after Mortefi's Outro Skill. Considering Mortefi's main kit revolves around his Liberation, you'd want this to have as little downtime as possible.

Recommended Main Echo:

Moonlit Clouds

(2-pc) Molten Rift

(2-pc) ★★☆ - 2nd Best Molten Rift pieces can also be used since Mortefi deals Fusion DMG.

Recommended Main Echo:

List of All Echoes and Sonata Effects

Mortefi Best Weapons

Best Weapons for Mortefi Ranked

Weapon Skill 1 Static Mist Stormy Resolution Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%. When Outro Skill is cast, increases the incoming Resonator's ATK by 10%, stacking up to 1 time(s). This effect lasts for 14s. 2 Undying Flame Loyalty When Intro Skill is cast, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 20% for 15s. 3 Novaburst Ever-Changing When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 4%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8s. 4 Cadenza Ceaseless Aria When Resonance Skill is cast, restore 8 Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s. 5 Thunderbolt Unstoppable When hitting a target with Basic Attacks or Heavy Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 7%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect lasts for 10s and can be triggered 1 time(s) every 1s. 6 Pistols of Night Chivalry When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%, lasting for 10s.

List of All Weapons

Mortefi Best Weapon Explained

As a Sub-DPS who can increase Heavy Attack DMG, Mortefi can use the Static Mist to increase the ATK of the next character. You can also use any Pistol that provides ATK stats to increase Mortefi's own DMG.

Mortefi Best Teams

Mortefi Heavy Attack Team

Sub-DPS Main DPS Support Mortefi Jiyan Verina

This team composition focuses on buffing Jiyan's overall damage in battle using Mortefi's buffs. Mortefi can increase Jiyan's Heavy Attack DMG.

General Rotation

1 Verina starts the battle and charges the Concerto Energy until the other Resonator's icons glow up. 2 Once Mortefi is fully charged, switch to Mortefi. Verina's Outro Skill will increase his ATK and provide the entire party with an All-Type DMG Deepen buff. 3 Keep attacking the enemy with Mortefi until his Resonance Liberation is up. Activate Mortefi's Resonance Liberation as soon as you can and then switch to Jiyan to increase the latter's Heavy Attack DMG. 4 Use Jiyan's Resonance Liberation to enter Qingloong Mode and deal a lot of DMG with his Resonance Skill and Heavy Attacks. 5 Repeat the steps until the enemy is felled.

Mortefi Coordinated Attack Team

Main DPS Sub-DPS Support Jinhsi Mortefi Verina

Aside from boosting Heavy Attack DMG, Mortefi can also provide Coordinated Attacks along with Verina. This is especially great for Jinhsi, since Coordinated Attacks can help stack up her Incandescence.

How to Play Mortefi

Mortefi Gameplay Guide

Cast Enhanced Resonance Skill to Deal More Damage

Combo Res. Skill → BA1 → BA2 → BA3 → BA4 → Resonance Skill: Fury Fugue (consumes 100 “Annoyance”)

When switching into Mortefi and his Ultimate has not yet been charged, do the combo shown above to accumulate Resonance Energy and also deal some damage.

Successfully executing the combo allows Mortefi to use his enhanced Resonance Skill!

Resonance Skill Restores More Annoyance

Using Mortefi's Resonance Skill followed by four Basic Attacks allows him to fill up his Forte Circuit gauge quickly because his Resonance Skill restores more “Annoyance” for 5 seconds.

Use Mortefi's Ultimate to Deal Coordinated Attacks

Mortefi's Ultimate is his most important ability since it makes Coordinated Attacks when switching out to other characters. Basically, Mortefi launches a follow-up attack when a character does a Basic Attack, firing 1 Mercato.

Mortefi also launches a follow-up attack when someone does a Heavy Attack, firing 2 Mercatos!

Outro Skill Buffs Heavy Attack Damage

Mortefi's Outro Skill is amazing since it can have the on-field character's Heavy Attack DMG Amplified by 38% for 14 seconds. His Outro Skill works well with characters such as Jiyan!

Ideally, you want to use Mortefi's Ultimate only when the Concerto Energy is full so his Outro Skill activates!

Mortefi Recommended Combos

Optimal Rotation Combo

Combo Intro Skill → Res. Skill → Res. Skill: Draconic Hellfire → Basic Attacks → Res. Skill: Draconic Hellfire

→ Echo → Res. Lib → Outro

Start by using his Intro Skill followed by his Resonance Skill. Afterwards, use the Draconic Hellfire and then use Mortefi's Basic Attacks to fill up Concerto Energy and gather Annoyance for Draconic Hellfire.

After using a second Draconic Hellfire, use Mortefi's Echo. Finish it up by using Mortefi's Resonance Liberation and then switching to the DPS to buff them with his Outro Skill.

If you have Mortefi's Sequence Node 4 unlocked, you can use the Resonance Liberation then his Echo since the former now has a higher uptime than an Echo's buffs.

Mortefi Skill Priority and Forte List

Skill Priority Explanation Normal Attack ★★★☆☆ Basic Attacks will be the main way for Mortefi to generate Annoyance stacks for his Forte Circuit. While it's not the highest priority skill to upgrade, you'd still want to level this up third with how often you'll be using it. Resonance Skill ★★☆☆☆ His Resonance Skill is also mainly used for Annoyance stacks and its upgrade priority can be swapped with his Basic Attack if you prefer using this over auto-attacking. Forte Circuit ★★★★☆ When you're using Mortefi as your active character, his Forte Circuit will be the main source of his DPS. Upgrade this after his Resonance Liberation so that he isn't used solely as an Ult bot. Resonance Liberation ★★★★★ Mortefi's Resonance Liberation is his most important skill, besides his Outro Skill, since it increases the damage output of whatever Basic Attacking Main DPS you switch to. Prioritize upgrading this skill above anything else to maximize the damage it deals. Intro Skill ★☆☆☆☆ While his Intro Skill isn't bad, it's still the lowest priority upgrade since it's mainly used to generate Mortefi's initial Annoyance charges.

Mortefi's coordinated attack damage comes mostly from his Resonance Liberation, so level that one up first. Afterward, focus on his Forte Circuit for an additional source of damage while following it up with his Resonance Skill.

This makes sure Mortefi can deal as much damage as possible with his off-field attacker role in the current meta.

Normal Attack

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Impromptu Show Basic Attack:

Mortefi uses his dual pistols and flames to perfrom up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion damage.

Heavy Attack:

Mortefi enters the aiming state, for a more powerful shot.

The aimed shot fired after charging deals Fusion DMG.

Mid-air Attack:

Mortefi consumes Stamina, to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG.

Dodge Counter:

Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

Attribute Bonuses:

1. Fusion DMG Bonus +1.80%

2. Fusion DMG Bonus +4.20%

Resonance Skill

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Passionate Variation Launch a flashing lightning of flames forward, dealing Fusion damage. Attribute Bonuses:

1. ATK +1.80%

2. ATK +4.20%

Forte Circuit

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Fury Fugue Resonance Skill - Draconic Hellfire:

When Mortefi's Annoyance reaches 100, his Resonance Skill is replaced with Fury Fudge

When casting Fury Fudge, Mortefi consumes all Annoyance to unleash high-speed flame lightning, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.

Annoyance:

Mortefi can hold up to 100 Annoyance.

When Normal Attack Impromptu Show hits the target, Annoyance is restored.

When Intro Skill Dissonance hits the target, Annoyance is restored.

Within 5s after casting Passionate Variation, Basic Attack Impromptu that hits the target additionally restores Annoyance.

Inherent Skills

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Inherent Skill 1:

Harmonic Control After casting Resonance Skill Passionate Variation for 8 seconds, the damage of Resonance SKill Fury Fugue is increased by 25% for 8s. Inherent Skill 2:

Rhythmic Vibrato During the duration of Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, each hit of Resonance Liberation Marcato will increase the damage of the next Resonance Liberation Marcato by 1.5%, which can be triggered once every 0.35 seconds, up to 50 times.^The effect will be reset after Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody ends.

Resonance Liberation

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Violent Finale Deals Fusion DMG, and apply Burning Rhapsody to all characters in the team. Burning Rhapsody:

When the on-field character's Basic Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a coordinated attack, firing 1 Marcato.

When the on-field character's Heavy Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a coordinated attack, firing 2 Marcato.

Mortefi can launch one Coordinated Attack every 0.35s.

Marcato:

Deals Fusion DMG.

Attribute Bonuses:

1. ATK +1.80%

2. ATK +4.20%

Intro Skill

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Dissonance Attack the target, dealing Fusion damage. Attribute Bonuses:

1. Fusion DMG Bonus +1.80%

2. Fusion DMG Bonus +4.20%

Outro Skill

NATK SKIL FORT INHE LIBE INTR OUTR

Rage Transposition The incoming character (or a character on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill) has their Heavy Attack DMG Amplified by 38% for 14s or until they are switched off field.

Mortefi Resonance Chain

Recommended Sequence Nodes

Why We Recommend It S1 ★★★☆☆ - Good Mortefi's Ultimate is already his best skill, and adding Coordinated Attacks to Resonance Skills, on top of Basic and Heavy Attacks, makes his Resonance Liberation so much stronger. The biggest downside, however, is that your Main DPS needs to use their Resonance Skill a lot, like Danjin or Lingyang. S2 ★★☆☆☆ - Okay This is an okay Sequence Node to unlock since Mortefi's most important skill is his Ultimate. Even though there are other ways to get Resonance Energy, having an extra source of Resonance Energy Regen will allow Mortefi to use equipment that has more offensive stats instead of ones with Energy Regen%. S3 ★★★★☆ - Great Having bonus CRIT DMG on his Ultimate is great since it allows Mortefi to focus on getting equipment with other substats. The only downside is that if his equipment doesn't have a CRIT Rate%, then you won't be able to make use of this upgrade. S4 ★★★★★ - Amazing Mortefi's S4 upgrade is by far the best one to unlock since it will extend his Ult's duration by 7 seconds. This will make the total duration of his Ultimate 17 seconds, leaving you with only a 7-second downtime in between Ult casts.

As a note, without this upgrade, it would be 14 seconds of downtime. S5 ★☆☆☆☆ - Bad While this is nice to have, you're mainly using Mortefi to buff up your Main DPS with his Resonance Liberation and Outro Skill. This can make Mortefi a good Main DPS, but he's still better suited for the Sub-DPS role. S6 ★★★★☆ - Great The capstone to his Resonance Chain further improves on his role as a Sub-DPS since you'll be swapping out to your Main DPS every time you use Mortefi's Resonance Liberation. This will boost their ATK on top of the ATK Boosted Coordinated Attacks that they get.

All Sequence Node Effects

S1 Solitary Etude During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, Mortefi launches Coordinated Attacks when the on-field character performs their Resonance Skills, firing 2 Resonance Liberation's Marcato hits, dealing Fusion Damage. S2 Hypocritical Hymn After using the Echo Skill, Mortefi restores an additional 10 Resonance Energy. This can be triggered once every 20 seconds. S3 Flaming Recitativo During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, the Crit. DMG of Resonance Liberation's Marcato is increased by 30%. S4 Cathartic Waltz The duration of Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody is extended by 7 seconds. S5 Funerary Quartet When Resonance Skill Fury Fugue hits a target, 4 Resonance Liberation's Marcato hits will be fired, dealing Fusion Damage. DMG of Resonance Liberation's Marcato fired in this way is reduced by 50%. S6 Apoplectoc Instrumental When Resonance Liberation Violent Finale is cast, ATK of all team members is increased by 20% for 20s.

How to Get Mortefi

Currently a Featured 4-Star Resonator

Limited Banner Vermillion's Ploy

Availability Version 1.1 - Phase 2 July 22, 2024 - August 14, 2024

(Asia)

Mortefi is a featured 4-star Resonator in a Convene banner running now. Make sure to pull for a higher chance of getting Mortefi!

Available in All Convene Banners

All Limited and Permanent Banners Vermillion's Ploy Tidal Chorus Weapon Permanent Convene Utterance of Marvels Beginner's Choice Convene Banner Absolute Pulsation (Changli)

Mortefi can be summoned from all Convenes available in Wuthering Waves! Players can get Mortefi every 10 pulls.

Mortefi In-Game Lore

Gender Male Birthplace New Federation Affiliation Jinzhou Basic Info Mortefi, a skilled expert in Applied Tacetite Study and a member of the Academy's Department of Safety, possesses the unique ability to transform his accumulated frustration into fiery flames. From a burning wrath that consumes all, the red dragon shall descend.
